support_summary: The VCP-ATXN3 complex promotes the extraction of RNF8 from DNA damage sites to prevent its overaccumulation and ensure proper repair.

functions.cellular_process: The p97/VCP-ATXN3 complex regulates the homeostasis of the E3 ubiquitin ligase RNF8. Under genotoxic stress, this complex stimulates the extraction of RNF8 from chromatin at DNA damage sites.
functions.effect_description: This extraction prevents the hyper-accumulation of RNF8 at DNA lesions, which would otherwise inhibit DNA repair pathways like non-homologous end joining (NHEJ). This process helps to balance DNA repair pathway choice and promotes cell survival following DNA damage.
biological_consequence: VCP-ATXN3 extracts RNF8 from chromatin → RNF8 overaccumulation is prevented → DNA repair pathway choice is balanced → Genome stability and cell survival after DNA damage are promoted
specific_effects: The p97–ATXN3 complex safeguards the soluble pool of RNF8.
Inactivation of the p97-ATXN3 complex hypersensitizes cancer cells to ionizing radiation.
ATXN3 deubiquitinates RNF8 to protect it from premature degradation.

evidence.paper_title: The p97–Ataxin 3 complex regulates homeostasis of the DNA damage response E3 ubiquitin ligase RNF8
ATXN3: a multifunctional protein involved in the polyglutamine disease spinocerebellar ataxia type 3
Ataxin-3 binds VCP/p97 and regulates retrotranslocation of ERAD substrates

mechanism: The p97/VCP-ATXN3 complex regulates the homeostasis of the E3 ubiquitin ligase RNF8. Under genotoxic stress, this complex stimulates the extraction of RNF8 from chromatin at DNA damage sites.
effect: This extraction prevents the hyper-accumulation of RNF8 at DNA lesions, which would otherwise inhibit DNA repair pathways like non-homologous end joining (NHEJ). This process helps to balance DNA repair pathway choice and promotes cell survival following DNA damage.
summary: ATXN3 activates RNF8 to modulate rnf8 chromatin extraction, ultimately affecting genome stability and cell survival after dna damage are promoted.

evidence.paper_title: The p97–Ataxin 3 complex regulates homeostasis of the DNA damage response E3 ubiquitin ligase RNF8
ATXN3: a multifunctional protein involved in the polyglutamine disease spinocerebellar ataxia type 3
Ataxin-3 binds VCP/p97 and regulates retrotranslocation of ERAD substrates
